title: This picture does not show Fidel Castro holding Justin Trudeau as a baby
subtitle: The picture is of the Cuban leader with Trudeau’s late brother, Michel.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
This picture does not show Fidel Castro holding Justin Trudeau as a baby

A Facebook post claiming to show a picture of Fidel Castro holding an infant Justin Trudeau, actually shows the Cuban leader holding the Canadian prime minister’s late brother, Michel.

Justin Trudeau’s father, Pierre, was also Canadian prime minister, and according to his son “was very proud to call [Fidel Castro] a friend”.

The photo is from a Pierre Trudeau’s state visit to Cuba in January 1976, when Michel was less than a year old. Justin Trudeau would have been four at the time.

A picture in colour, from the same trip, shows Pierre, his wife Margaret, and baby Michel Trudeau with Fidel Castro. All the evidence we’ve seen suggests they were the only three members of the family who visited Cuba in 1976, and that Justin (as well as his brother Sasha, who was two at the time) did not make the trip.

When Fidel Castro died in 2016, Justin Trudeau said he had only “had the opportunity to meet Fidel when my father passed away” in the year 2000.
